text: 5:12 2 Korin 1:14; 3:1E ua mɨgeir akar kam, e ian aghariba apɨrtɨ, ia en ziaba fɨ suam, e gumazir aghuiba, e kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ. Ia fo, marazi pura gumazamizibar ziar ekiaba itiba bagha bar akongegha, men navimɨn aven otivir araziba bagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e kamaghsua, ia gumazir kabar akaba ikarvaghamin fofozim ikɨ. Bizir kamɨn e ia bagha osiri, eghtɨ ia en arazir aghuiba bagh bar akongegham.
